def ncr(n,r):
	if(r>n):
		return 0;
	if(r>n/2):
		r=n-r;
	val=1;
	for i in range(1,r+1):
		val=(val*(n-i+1))/i;
		#print val;
	return val;
def main():
	import sys;
	infile=sys.stdin;
	inp=infile.readline();
	t=int(inp);
	while(t>0):
		t=t-1;
		inp=infile.readline();
		n=int(inp);
		#k=input();
		if(n>0):
			ans=ncr(2*n-2,n-1)/n;
		else:
			ans=0;
		ans=ans%10000;
		print ans;
	return 0;
main();
